text: Philip E. Curran (May 1, 1927-March 23, 2018) was an American banker and politician from Maine. Curran worked for Casco Bank and Trust Company for 39 years, including as manager of several of the company's branch offices. A Republican residing in Westbrook, Maine, Curran was elected to the Maine House of Representatives in 1986 and re-elected two years later. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American bankers Category:Politicians from Westbrook, Maine Category:Maine Republicans Category:Members of the Maine House of Representatives
title: Philip E. Curran
